alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:44PM EST until March 10 at 12:08AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River. Eel River at Bowling Green. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Ravenswood. * WHEN...From this evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.5 feet, River Road floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 7.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by later this evening.
